definitions: The act of forming words with the mouth without making any sound.
The act of speaking or uttering words, especially in a pompous or insincere way.
The act of putting something into the mouth.
The act of shaping or forming with the mouth.
examples: She was mouthing silent apologies across the room.
He was mouthing platitudes about peace.
The baby was mouthing the toy.
The artist was mouthing the clay into a figure.
